text: There are laws for peace as well as war.
author: Titus Livius

text: Peace in Palestine is inevitable. The question is how do we make it happen today.
author: Darrell Issa

text: You have to find the peace and patience within yourself to be a model and an example to others and not judge.
author: Judith Light

text: Challenging the integrity of the non-proliferation regime is a matter which can affect international peace and security.
author: Mohamed ElBaradei

text: We believe democracy to be the only real guarantor of stability and we have sought to create a 'Jordanian model' that might also inspire others in our region. I wish democracy and peace to be my legacy to my people and the shield of generations to come.
author: King Hussein I
